feed.title: ININ-Drops
feed.subtitle: Welcome to our Research Group ININ-Drops! We are from the Integrated Navigation and Intelligent Navigation Laboratory(ININ) at the School of Automation, Beijing Institute of Technology. Our primary focus is on research in robotic perception methods. We warmly welcome you to join us and explore the fascinating world of robotics and intelligent systems together.
